item.title: ECB's €500 Billion Payoff Puts Italian Banks in the Firing Line
item.description: ECB’s €500 Billion Payoff Puts Italian Banks in the Firing Line The European Central Bank (ECB) is about to make lenders repay about half a trillion euros in cheap pandemic-era loans. Italian banks are the most exposed to this repayment, with €476.
